vernac_cmds: Lemma succ_max_distr : forall n m, S (max n m) == max (S n) (S m).
destruct (le_ge_cases n m); [rewrite 2 max_r | rewrite 2 max_l]; now rewrite <- ?succ_le_mono.
Lemma succ_min_distr : forall n m, S (min n m) == min (S n) (S m).
destruct (le_ge_cases n m); [rewrite 2 min_l | rewrite 2 min_r]; now rewrite <- ?succ_le_mono.
Lemma pred_max_distr : forall n m, P (max n m) == max (P n) (P m).
destruct (le_ge_cases n m); [rewrite 2 max_r | rewrite 2 max_l]; now rewrite <- ?pred_le_mono.
Lemma pred_min_distr : forall n m, P (min n m) == min (P n) (P m).
destruct (le_ge_cases n m); [rewrite 2 min_l | rewrite 2 min_r]; now rewrite <- ?pred_le_mono.
Lemma add_max_distr_l : forall n m p, max (p + n) (p + m) == p + max n m.
destruct (le_ge_cases n m); [rewrite 2 max_r | rewrite 2 max_l]; now rewrite <- ?add_le_mono_l.
Lemma add_max_distr_r : forall n m p, max (n + p) (m + p) == max n m + p.
destruct (le_ge_cases n m); [rewrite 2 max_r | rewrite 2 max_l]; now rewrite <- ?add_le_mono_r.
Lemma add_min_distr_l : forall n m p, min (p + n) (p + m) == p + min n m.
destruct (le_ge_cases n m); [rewrite 2 min_l | rewrite 2 min_r]; now rewrite <- ?add_le_mono_l.
Lemma add_min_distr_r : forall n m p, min (n + p) (m + p) == min n m + p.
destruct (le_ge_cases n m); [rewrite 2 min_l | rewrite 2 min_r]; now rewrite <- ?add_le_mono_r.
Lemma opp_max_distr : forall n m, -(max n m) == min (-n) (-m).
Lemma opp_min_distr : forall n m, -(min n m) == max (-n) (-m).
Lemma sub_max_distr_l : forall n m p, max (p - n) (p - m) == p - min n m.
Lemma sub_max_distr_r : forall n m p, max (n - p) (m - p) == max n m - p.
destruct (le_ge_cases n m); [rewrite 2 max_r | rewrite 2 max_l]; try order; now apply sub_le_mono_r.
Lemma sub_min_distr_l : forall n m p, min (p - n) (p - m) == p - max n m.
Lemma sub_min_distr_r : forall n m p, min (n - p) (m - p) == min n m - p.
destruct (le_ge_cases n m); [rewrite 2 min_l | rewrite 2 min_r]; try order; now apply sub_le_mono_r.
Lemma mul_max_distr_nonneg_l : forall n m p, 0 <= p -> max (p * n) (p * m) == p * max n m.
destruct (le_ge_cases n m); [rewrite 2 max_r | rewrite 2 max_l]; try order; now apply mul_le_mono_nonneg_l.
Lemma mul_max_distr_nonneg_r : forall n m p, 0 <= p -> max (n * p) (m * p) == max n m * p.
destruct (le_ge_cases n m); [rewrite 2 max_r | rewrite 2 max_l]; try order; now apply mul_le_mono_nonneg_r.
Lemma mul_min_distr_nonneg_l : forall n m p, 0 <= p -> min (p * n) (p * m) == p * min n m.
destruct (le_ge_cases n m); [rewrite 2 min_l | rewrite 2 min_r]; try order; now apply mul_le_mono_nonneg_l.
Lemma mul_min_distr_nonneg_r : forall n m p, 0 <= p -> min (n * p) (m * p) == min n m * p.
destruct (le_ge_cases n m); [rewrite 2 min_l | rewrite 2 min_r]; try order; now apply mul_le_mono_nonneg_r.
Lemma mul_max_distr_nonpos_l : forall n m p, p <= 0 -> max (p * n) (p * m) == p * min n m.
Lemma mul_max_distr_nonpos_r : forall n m p, p <= 0 -> max (n * p) (m * p) == min n m * p.
Lemma mul_min_distr_nonpos_l : forall n m p, p <= 0 -> min (p * n) (p * m) == p * max n m.
Lemma mul_min_distr_nonpos_r : forall n m p, p <= 0 -> min (n * p) (m * p) == max n m * p.

command: destruct (le_ge_cases n m); [rewrite 2 max_r | rewrite 2 max_l]; now rewrite <- ?succ_le_mono.
destruct (le_ge_cases n m); [rewrite 2 min_l | rewrite 2 min_r]; now rewrite <- ?succ_le_mono.
destruct (le_ge_cases n m); [rewrite 2 max_r | rewrite 2 max_l]; now rewrite <- ?pred_le_mono.
destruct (le_ge_cases n m); [rewrite 2 min_l | rewrite 2 min_r]; now rewrite <- ?pred_le_mono.
destruct (le_ge_cases n m); [rewrite 2 max_r | rewrite 2 max_l]; now rewrite <- ?add_le_mono_l.
destruct (le_ge_cases n m); [rewrite 2 max_r | rewrite 2 max_l]; now rewrite <- ?add_le_mono_r.
destruct (le_ge_cases n m); [rewrite 2 min_l | rewrite 2 min_r]; now rewrite <- ?add_le_mono_l.
destruct (le_ge_cases n m); [rewrite 2 min_l | rewrite 2 min_r]; now rewrite <- ?add_le_mono_r.
destruct (le_ge_cases n m); [rewrite 2 max_r | rewrite 2 max_l]; try order; now apply sub_le_mono_r.
destruct (le_ge_cases n m); [rewrite 2 min_l | rewrite 2 min_r]; try order; now apply sub_le_mono_r.
destruct (le_ge_cases n m); [rewrite 2 max_r | rewrite 2 max_l]; try order; now apply mul_le_mono_nonneg_l.
destruct (le_ge_cases n m); [rewrite 2 max_r | rewrite 2 max_l]; try order; now apply mul_le_mono_nonneg_r.
destruct (le_ge_cases n m); [rewrite 2 min_l | rewrite 2 min_r]; try order; now apply mul_le_mono_nonneg_l.
destruct (le_ge_cases n m); [rewrite 2 min_l | rewrite 2 min_r]; try order; now apply mul_le_mono_nonneg_r.
